bibl.title: P. Heid. Gr. inv. 1281 verso: an official document from the Ptolemaic Period.
Scritti in onore di Orsolina Montevecchi (Bologna, 1981) pp. 401-406.
bibl.author: Thomas, J. David

bibl.note: The text is written on the verso of S.B. IV, 7377. - Administrative correspondence. At the latest early second cent. B.C.
